a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

span.p: Please note,somedates may change throughout the year due to unforeseen circumstances or make-up days. This pdf will not be adjusted to reflect changes throughout the year, however you can see those changes reflected on the District calendar below.

a.title: Go to comments for 2019-2020 School Calendar

span.p: Recuerden por favor, que algunas fechas del calendario pueden cambiar durante el ao por circunstancias imprevistas o das de recuperacin. Este pdf no se ajustar a los cambios que ocurran durante el ao, sin embargo estarn reflejados en el calendario delDistrito Escolar a continuacin.

a.title: Go to comments for 2019-2020 Calendario Escolar

span.p: Due to changes in Missouri Law, the 2020-2021 school calendar will look a bit different than previous years. Classes can start no earlier than 14 calendar days before the first Monday in September. That means the 2020-21 school year cannot start until Aug. 24 in 2020. Also,Districts are required to offer at least 1,044 hours of instruction annually.The Neosho School District has scheduled more than 1,044 hours in the 2020-21 school calendar. What this means is the calendar is set, no snow days will have to be made up due to the calendar having more than the required hours already built-in.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-2021 School Calendar

span.p: Debido al cambio de Ley del estado de Missouri, el prximoaoescolar 2020- 2021 realizar algunos ajustes. Las clases no podrn iniciar antes de 14 dasdel primer lunes en septiembre. Esto significa, que el primer dade clases ser el 24 de agosto de 2020. Adems, todos los distritos escolares debern incluir mnimo 1,044 horas de instruccinacadmicaanual. El Distrito Escolar de Neosho ha organizado un horario con ms de 1,044 horas de instruccin para el ao2020-2021 con el fin de tener en cuenta cualquier contratiempo y cancelacinde clases por motivos climticos; el calendario tendr programado estos das dentro del horario y no habr necesidad de su recuperacin.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-2021 Calendario Escolar
